properties.name: Good Dog Deed At Shell
properties.description: Posted by Finney5885 Constitution Ave, Colorado Springs, COI saw two gentlemen, one teenager and one adult male, help a woman find her dog. There was a real risk of the dog getting run over, because this was at the gas pumps. The dog was found and returned to the woman. Everyone was happy. ***** dog, dogs, happy dog, good deed, pay it forward

properties.name: Kind Guy Lets Me Into Key Bank Building
properties.description: Posted by Finney1115 Elkton Dr, Colorado Springs, COI was going to an important mentorship meeting at the Key Bank Building. All the doors were locked! I couldn\'t get in! I had paid thousands of dollars to get this training and I couldn\'t get into the building! Fortunately, I ran into a nice person whose wife was inside. One cell phone call and 2 minutes later, I am inside. Whew! Thank you for your good deed!

properties.name: Kind Wife Brings Memory Stick To Guy at Circuit City
properties.description: Posted by Finney7670 N Academy Blvd, Colorado Springs, COLong ago the day after Thanksgiving, a guy at Circuit City wanted a memory stick which he could not find. Long lines and a packed store kept him where he was in line. My wife got the item for the guy.

properties.name: Letters Keep Falling On My Head At The Post Office
properties.description: Posted by Finney4356 Montebello Dr, Colorado Springs, COAt the post office, an elderly lady dropped two of her envelopes and as I was picking them up for her she dropped another on my head. It was a funny moment. She apologized and with a smile I said I was grateful for the opportunity to do a good deed. She smiled back.

properties.name: McDonalds - Gift Of Money From Kind Stranger
properties.description: Posted by FinneySomeone gave us free money there. A total stranger gave us a card and a gift of money.

So, it was a wasted trip except for the pleasure of speaking with an Office Max person who said nobody there deals with the FedEx Pick Up Point. I understand. It\'s not their domain.

properties.name: Saved Elder A Trip at Wild Oats
properties.description: Posted by Finney3180 New Center Pt, Colorado Springs, Colorado, United States, North AmericaMichael Finney took a cart from an elderly man when he was done with it. That way the elderly man did not have to walk the cart to the cart carriage from his car. He thanked me. One small step for me, one giant leap in good deeds. ************ Good deeds, pay it forward, good

properties.name: Sweet Good Deed at King Soopers
properties.description: Posted by Finney6030 Stetson Hills Blvd, Colorado Springs, COI slipped a little on some sugar that was on the floor; sweet. There was a man with his daughter. He was trying to get the shopping done and the daughter was unhappy. He looked uncomfortable as if this is something he is not used to doing. I had a sense that he missed whoever it was that was not with him. Perhaps it was all in my head; perhaps he was just a man and I am the one who felt lost. In any case, I overheard him say he was looking for a certain kind of peanut butter. He’d been looking quite a while. I knew where it was and I offered him the peanut butter. He had a surprised look on his face as if anyone offering any kind of help at all is a miracle. He looked again at his coupons (those frightening and confusing coupons) and said yup that was what he needs. He thanked me with gratitude in his eyes that went beyond just giving him peanut butter. He never stopped leaning on his cart. I wonder what the story is. When I warned him about the sugar on the floor, he was even more grateful. I cannot describe it. It’s as if I confirmed that this place was a special place or that people are nice. Am I speaking about Colorado Springs? I don’t know. I went on my way. Could I have done more? Yes. I realize now I could have gone to the manager and told her or him about the spill in the aisle. I’m still learning. Doing good deeds take practice. *********** Good Deeds, Pay It Forward

properties.name: Wild Oats - I helped a Grocery Person
properties.description: Posted by Finney3180 New Center Pt, Colorado Springs, Colorado, United States, North AmericaI helped a grocer person with taking back a large line of grocery carts. He bit off a little more than he could chew. I am glad to have been of help. He thanked me when I went into the store and when I left as well.

properties.name: Wild Oats - Told Woman How To Live Longer via CR!
properties.description: Posted by Finney3180 New Center Pt, Colorado Springs, Colorado, United States, North AmericaI explained how someone can live longer. I even gave my phone number, email address, and name to her. I had just met her. Maybe that\'s not risky. I do not know. Some stuff I shared: it\'s a scientific fact that the less calories you burn the longer you will live. A person must keep the nutrition up, don\'t go too low, and other tips. See http://www.calorierestriction.org The sooner an adult person starts, the longer he or she may live. Read http://www.calorierestriction.org FAQ! ***** pay it forward, good deeds, cron, cr, Calorie Restriction Society
